Package p11_package

Class BST_HashClass

java.lang.Object
p11_package.BST_HashClass
public class BST_HashClass
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Luke Frazer Hash Class that uses BST elements for data storage

    • DEFAULT_TABLE_SIZE

      private static final int DEFAULT_TABLE_SIZE
      Table size default

      Table size (capacity) is recommended to be a prime number

      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

      inStudentID - - student ID
      inGender - - gender of student
      inGPA - - gpa of student

    • clearHashTable

      public void clearHashTable()
      Clears hash table by clearing all BST elements

    • findItem

      public p11_package.StudentClassNode findItem​(int studentID)
      Searches for item in hash table using student ID as key
      Parameters:
      studentID - - used for requesting data
      Returns:
      StudentClassNode object removed, or null if not found

    • generateHash

      public int generateHash​(p11_package.StudentClassNode studentData)
      Method uses student ID to generate hash value for use as index in hash table

      Process sums the Unicode values of each of the student ID digits converted to characters, and then creates a hash index

      Parameters:
      studentData - - StudentClasNode object from which hash value will be generated
      Returns:
      integer value to be used as array index

    • removeItem

      public p11_package.StudentClassNode removeItem​(int studentID)
      Removes Item from hash table, using student ID as key
      Parameters:
      studentID - - used for requesting data
      Returns:
      StudentClassNode object to be removed, or null if not found

    • showHashTableStatus

      public void showHashTableStatus()
      traverses through all array bins, finds counts from each BST, then displays as table

      Shows table of list lengths, then shows table size, then shows the number of empty bins and the longest linked list of the set; adapts to any size array
